description:
Yujin is captured by the Ultimate Four, and the App Drives are destroyed, meaning Gatchmon and the others are all gone! Haru is feeling adrift, when suddenly, he hears a voice from an unexpected place...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gacchimon o Torimodose! Den`emon Jii-chan no Shiren!
Take Back Gatchmon! Grandpa Deneimon`s Test!
ガッチモンを取り戻せ! 電衛門じいちゃんの試練!
